Title: Chak De! India
Discription: Indian underdog sports film will make American girls cheer.

Title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
Discription: Fun Bollywood romance has occasional bad language.

Title: Swades
Discription: Bollywood drama looks at discrimination in India; smoking.

Title: Dear Zindagi
Discription: Bollywood romantic drama looks at mental health and therapy.

Title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham...
Discription: Feel-good Bollywood family drama balances sadness and joy.

Title: Rainbow (Dhanak)
Discription: Upbeat Bollywood sibling drama has mild language and peril.

Title: Ta Ra Rum Pum
Discription: Fanciful Bollywood dramedy fine for tweens and up.

Title: Three of Us
Discription: Emotional Bollywood drama about dementia has mature themes.

Title: Wake Up Sid
Discription: Sweet Bollywood coming-of-age romcom has positive messages.

Title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
Discription: Musical romcom Bollywood classic; violent fight, drinking.

Title: Jodhaa Akbar
Discription: Bollywood epic promotes religious harmony; violent battles.

Title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
Discription: Colonial India sports drama has racism, prejudice, violence.

Title: Veer-Zaara
Discription: Bollywood forbidden love tale with song, dance, drama.

Title: Pagglait
Discription: Slow family drama finds widow looking for personal freedom.

Title: 3 Idiots
Discription: Bollywood comedy about friendship has suicide and drinking.

Title: Badhaai Do
Discription: Comedy-drama depicts struggles of India's queer community.

Title: Bombay Rose
Discription: Slow but gorgeous animated romance has mature themes.

Title: Brahmastra Part One: Shiva
Discription: Epic Bollywood film inspires, entertains; violence, tension.

Title: Bride and Prejudice
Discription: Fluffy Bollywood-style musical romance.

Title: Dil Dhadakne Do
Discription: Romantic Bollywood comedy-drama about marriage and family.
